dmca.title: Re:  "Be Careful Who You SLAPP," by Michelangelo Delfino and Mary Day
dmca.body:
[Private]

Re: "Be Careful Who You SLAPP," by Michelangelo Delfino and Mary Day 


We write to notify you that Barnes & Noble is offering for sale a book that may be defamatory. 

It has come to our attention that Barnes & Nobel is currently offering for sale on its website (ww.bn.com) a book entitled Be Careful Who You SLAPP, authored by Michelangelo Delfino and Mary Day. According to the website, this book is currently only available for pre-order and is scheduled for release on January 28, 2003.  Although we have not yet had the opportunity to review this book, our experience with the author(s) demonstrates that it is likely to contain material that defames and harasses our clients.

Enclosed is a copy of the Judgment entered in favor of our clients against Mr. Delfino and Ms. Day by the Superior Court of California for the County of Santa Clara.
